data.text:
In Tony Kushner

…screenplays to Steven Spielberg’s films Munich (2005; cowritten with Eric Roth), Lincoln (2012), and The Fabelmans (2022; cowritten with Spielberg), all of which earned Kushner Academy Award nominations. He also wrote the script for Spielberg’s remake of West Side Story (2021). In addition, Kushner authored the children’s book Brundibar (2003;

Read More

In Steven Spielberg: The 2000s

Munich (2005) was a far more serious and controversial piece of work. Eric Bana starred as Avner, an agent of Israel’s Mossad who is asked by Prime Minister Golda Meir to head a team of assassins whose mission is to hunt down and execute the…

Read More

In Daniel Craig

…disillusioned cocaine dealer and in Munich (2005) evinced a Mossad agent intent on avenging the murder of Israeli athletes at the 1972 Olympic Games. Craig then portrayed one of the killers depicted by Truman Capote in his “nonfiction novel” In Cold Blood in the film Infamous (2006), the mysterious Lord…
